page.title: 06Day in the Life of Mr. Webb
page.content: Mr. Webb lives in the old school house which is mid way between Sutton and Lound. He runs his own business called Lound Garden Services. He gets up each day about 7 o'clock and takes the dogs for a walk. Then he milks the goats with his wife and feeds all the animals. After he has had his breakfast he goes to work at Lound Hall where he looks after the garden. Sometimes he finds that the horse or the sheep have eaten some of his plants. He goes home for his dinner and he works in Sutton in the afternoon. He goes at 4.o'clock and then does his own gardening. He sells a lot of bedding plants, celery, tomato plants and when the fruit is ready he also sells that. At night he milks and feeds the goats again. He sells the goats' milk.
